Australia.info: parkrun launched in Australia at Main Beach on the Gold Coast on 2 April 2011 with 108 runners, including the great Ron Clarke AO MBE in attendance.

Austria.info: Hellbrunn parkrun joins the parkrun family in August 2021

Canada.info: parkrun Canada launched in the heart of the Rocky Mountains in August 2016, and continues to ignite passion for running communities across the country.

Denmark.info: Launched at Amager Faelled, Copenhagen in May 2009 by Jonathan Sydenham, who fell in love with parkrun when he participated while in the UK.

Eswatini.info: Mbabane parkrun joined the parkrun family May 2017 putting Eswatini on the parkrun map.

Finland.info: parkrun Finland started at Tampere parkrun on 14 October 2017.

France.info: parkrun France launched in June 2015 under the watchful eye of Anita with the first event in Les Dougnes

Germany.info: parkrun Germany started at Küchenholz, Neckarau, and Georgengarten parkruns on 2 December 2017.

Ireland.info: The first parkrun in the Republic of Ireland started in Malahide Demesne Castle and Gardens on the 10th November 2012. It continues to be a revelation.

Italy.info: Giorgio brought parkrun to Italy in May 2015 with the first event taking place in Uditore.

Japan.info: parkrun Japan launched on 6 April 2019 making it the 21st Country to join the parkrun family. The first event was held at Futakotamagawa parkrun, Tokyo.

Malaysia.info: Taman Pudu Ulu parkrun started in April 2018 as the first parkrun in Malaysia.

Namibia.info: Swakopmund & Walvis Bay parkruns take place every week in Namibia.

Netherlands.info: parkrun Netherlands launched their first events early in February 2020!

New Zealand.info: parkrun New Zealand started at Lower Hutt parkrun on 5 May 2012, with 89 people, including volunteers.

Norway.info: parkrun Norway started in August 2017 with the first event in Tøyenparken, Oslo.

Poland.info: Launched in October 2011 at Gdynia, only five runners attended the first event. We've now added more events, offering runs to tens of thousands.

Singapore.info: South East Asia's very first parkrun launched at East Coast Park in June 2014 with twenty-nine runners completing the sea-front course.

South Africa.info: parkrun South Africa started in November 2011 at Delta Park, Johannesburg, where 22 parkrun pioneers completed the hot and very hilly 5km loop.

Sweden.info: parkrun Sweden started with Haga parkrun, Hagaparken, Stockholm, in August 2016.

United Kingdom.info: Where it all began. The first event was held in Bushy Park, Teddington in October 2004 comprised of 13 pioneers and four volunteers.

USA.info: Formed June 2012 at Livonia, Michigan with 28 people in attendance. Recent events are Clermont, Florida and Durham, North Carolina.
